snippet: Nassau and Suffolk Counties are planning to open electronic slot machine parlors years before proposed casino resorts could open north and west of New York City.
abstract: Officials in Suffolk And Nassau Counties are hoping for financial windfall from gamblers at new electronic slot machine parlors planned by Off-Track Betting Corp.
lead_paragraph: Nassau and Suffolk Counties are planning to open electronic slot machine parlors years before proposed casino resorts could open north and west of New York City.

headline.main: Long Island Could Lead in New York’s Gambling Plans With New Sites
headline.print_headline: Long Island Could Lead in New York’s Gambling Plans With New Sites
